	Things that can help you  
 pass the time and relax,  
 for example books,

	A sponge or water spray

	Front-opening  
 nightdresses or pyjamas

 breastfeed.
	Light dressing gown and  
 slippers.
	Five or six pairs of pants  
 or disposable pants.
	A loose, comfortable  
	 outfit	to	come	home	in.
	Clothes (including a hat)  
 and 24 nappies for the  
 baby.
	A shawl or blanket to  
 wrap the baby in.
